full_description:
Mibro Z3 Kids Smart Watch

The Mibro Z3 Kids Smart Watch is designed to keep children connected and safe. It boasts a durable and vibrant display that is resistant to shocks, scratches, and falls, ensuring excellent visibility even under sunlight. With its 1000 mAh battery, the watch offers an impressive battery life of up to 8 days in active mode and up to 13 days in standby mode. The watch supports mobile communication and Wi-Fi connectivity, allowing voice and video calls as well as chat functions. Parents can take advantage of the parental control features, such as setting safe zones and receiving instant notifications if their child goes beyond the boundaries. The watch is waterproof, enabling swimming at depths of up to two meters, and it features IPX8 protection to safeguard against moisture. The Mibro Z3 watch offers a wide range of functionality, including setting up a class schedule, monitoring sports activities, accessing the side camera to see what the child is doing, engaging in chats, and activating the search mode.

full_description:
Mibro C3 Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch

The Mibro C3 Smart Watch offers a dual-core 2-in-1 chip, a 1.85" HD screen with a smooth 60fps frame rate. The Smart Watch offers convenient wrist Bluetooth calling. This fitness tracking smart watch is equipped with an advanced 4 PD heart rate monitoring. It offers extensive support for 70 sport modes, a remarkable 10-day battery life. Mibro C3 Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch offers reliable 2ATM waterproofing.

Dual-core 2-in-1 Chip

The Mibro C3 Smart Watch comes with a brand new two-in-one Bluetooth chip that enables seamless and stable connections. With a simple click, users can connect to dual-mode Bluetooth, ensuring reliability. The watch's low power consumption and dual-core architecture enhance processor performance by 80%, delivering improved efficiency. Additionally, the inclusion of a 2.5D GPU empowers fluid dynamic wallpaper for a visually enhanced experience.

1.85" HD Screen with 60Hz Refresh Rate

The Mibro C3 Smart Watch features a spacious 1.85" HD screen that offers an expansive and clear visual experience. With an impressive 60Hz screen refresh rate, the watch ensures a smooth and fluid user interaction. The 60fps frame rate, refreshing 60 frames per second, contributes to seamless visuals. Adding to its appeal, the watch supports cool and dynamic dials, providing an interactive experience where users can enjoy playful interactions like igniting fireworks with a simple touch on the screen.

Wrist Bluetooth calling

The Mibro C3 Smart Watch offers a touch of elegance to your calling experience. Whether you're immersed in work or engaged in exercise, the watch allows you to seamlessly answer calls with ease and convenience. Managing unwanted calls is a breeze, simply click to send an SMS and reject calls effortlessly, ensuring a hassle-free communication experience.

Updated Health Monitoring

The Mibro C3 Smart Watch features an advanced 4PD matrix heart rate sensor, coupled with a professional optical design and finely crafted Fresnel lens, this watch ensures highly efficient heart rate monitoring with unparalleled accuracy. The integration of biometric identification technology further enhances measurement precision. You can benefit from round-the-clock heart rate monitoring with the innovative heart rate sensor, providing comprehensive insights into your heart health throughout the day. Wear the watch during your sleep to gain valuable insights into your sleep patterns and overall sleep quality, empowering you with information to improve your rest. The Mibro C3 can conveniently measure your blood oxygen saturation levels with ease.

Tailored Precision for Women's Health

The Mibro C3 Smart Watch goes the extra mile by incorporating precision algorithms to address women's health needs. Record your physiological cycle effortlessly and receive predictions for upcoming menstrual and ovulation periods, providing invaluable support for proactive health management.

70+ Sports Modes

Mibro C3 Smart Watch offers over 70 workout modes including running, cycling, swimming, outdoor and indoor activities. It covers a wide range of options like dance, ball games, aquatic sports, and fighting, enhancing your fitness tracking experience.

2ATM Waterproof

The Mibro C3 Smart Watch is rated at 2ATM waterproof, as per Mibro lab tests. It's important to note that the actual waterproof effect may vary depending on the specific product, user habits, and environmental conditions, including factors like temperature, humidity, and pressure. While the watch is resistant to water exposure, it is not suitable for activities such as scuba diving, surfing, or hot spring use.

10-day Battery Life

The Mibro C3 Smart Watch ensures worry-free usage with its impressive 10-day ultra-long battery life. Thanks to an upgraded low power consumption chip and optimized algorithms, a single charge offers a remarkable 10 days of uninterrupted use, providing extended convenience and efficiency.

full_description:
Mibro S5 Kids 4G Smart Watch

Mibro S5 Kids 4G Smart Watch is a smartwatch from Mibro. This Smartwatch is designed specifically for children. So naturally, they come with a few child-friendly features. It has an IPX8 Water-Resistance rating. The display is a 1.30-inch IPS Panel TFT 240 x 240 pixels HD screen. It has an 860mAH Lithium battery that uses Magnetic charging. The Sports modes include Outdoor running and rope skipping. This watch also has a pedometer to count Steps.

4G Cellular Network and Wi-Fi Support

This Mibro smartwatch supports 4G Cellular Networks making it a Watch Phone. This feature is particularly helpful for parents to locate their children. The supported Bands include GSM: B3/B8; WCDMA: B1/B5/B8; FDD-LTE: B1/B3/B5/B8 and DD-LTEB38/B39/B40/B41. So it is usable in 2G, 3G, or 4G networks. It also comes with Wi-fi Support.

9 Location Modes with GPS and SOS

This Smartwatch comes equipped with 9 Location Modes with GPS and SOS. The location mode stores up the last 9 locations the child has been to and the capacity allows it to store 3-month data. This smartwatch also supports GPS, Beidou, Basestation, and Wi-Fi plus location modes. To signal for emergencies the watch has an SOS function. To activate it the user has to Long Press the SOS Button and the concerned party will be notified of the location of the wearer. It also has advanced tracking options. namely: G-sensor, AGPS, IndoorLocation, Photo assisted positioning, and smart Al Locating. The GPS for Children in this watch also features real-time Trajectory Tracking alongside Add friends and pet tracking.

Video Call and Remote Shooting

Mibro S5 Kids 4G Smart Watch also comes equipped with a 2 million pixels HD Camera which allows remote access feed. which enables the user to Video Call and Remote Shooting. so it is possible to Video call, Voicechat, and take photographs. Mibro S5 Kids 4G Smart Watch offers No Warranty.
